document.full_text: israeli prime minister benjamin netanyahu said he was reconsidering nuclear energy for israel because of the crisis over radiation leaking from a crippled japanese nuclear power plant.
document.title: israel's netanyahu says rethinking nuclear power
lines_and_colors: israeli prime minister benjamin netanyahu said he was reconsidering nuclear energy for israel because of the crisis over radiation leaking from a crippled japanese nuclear power plant.
